resources.string: All the financial institutes owned by our rich bunny have overcome the crisis and are rolling in cash once again. Of course this means huge bonuses for our bunny. The men carrying suitcases full of money are already on their way to bunny\'s home. Stop them to spare him even bigger wealth!

In this tower-defense-style level you have to arm bunny\'s front yard to blast those no good money carrying bastards back to where they came from. Hire mercenaries to stop the carriers from reaching your doorstep. But beware: they are determined to hand you your hard earned bonuses and they are coming prepared.

The game is played from a bird\'s eye view. Enemies approach from the right side of the screen and try to reach the door on the left. The lawn in the middle can be equipped with various types of soldiers that can be selected from the menu. All you have to do is place them and they will handle the "rest". The game\'s goal is to stop as many money carriers as possible from reaching your house.

Place bunny mercs on your lawn to fend of the money carriers. Bunnies get paid with carrots (C) that you earn by destroying money carriers.
 
 Available mercenaries:
Elite Soldier (30C), double damage compared to Basic Mercenary\n
RoboBunny3000 (60C), double damage compared to Elite Soldier\n
Freeze-Merc (60C), freezes enemies to half their speed and HP\n
of them did not make it..
Your enemies, these bad people try to give you money! For free!!!\n
At first the bank tries to get rid of their small coins and sends them to you!\n
This time the bank sends you a money courier! Surely tougher than those small money coins!\n
This time the money courier is driving by motorbike. Get him!!!\n
Tough son of a b#&%*! A armored money transporter!\n
